question: Which Indian monument was featured in the list of top 10 Global Landmarks, by Traveller's Choice?
explanation: Taj Mahal, one of the most iconic wonders in the world, the Agra- based imposing white marble structure, a tourist delight, is the only Indian monument to figure in the world's top 10 Travellers' Choice awards for Landmarks. Angkor Wat in Siem Reap (Cambodia) topped the list followed by Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque Center in Abu Dhabi (UAE), Mezquita Cathedral de Cordoba in Cordoba (Spain) and St Peter's Basilica in Vatican City (Italy). According to the Asia list, Taj Mahal was at No. 2 spot after Angkor Wat.
